name: nyu
text: If i was trick or treating and an alive stuffed otter opened the door, I'd hug it.

text: All things considered, it's amazing/awesome/scary that this hasn't gotten a single fricking lame.  That's not an invitation to boardsquatters, by the way.

text: It couldn't last forever.

text:
Me too, man.

Of course nowadays I smoke weed everyday so I have become mellow to the extreme

name: senor_diablo
text: Phillipe rocks! He can hand out Halloween candy at my place this year!

name: nexus
text: I don't know, I think the "trick or treat" thign was there just to point out that it was Halloween, but I always assumed Philippe went out to talk to the person in the otter costume.

name: dusty
text: I don't see why this was lammed, other than the typo. It is an interesting alternative explanation.

name: mortshire
text: i hope that wasn't a damaging experience for philippe.

name: saint
text: He may need to dip his arm in the toilet to recover

name: a_dude
text: curious ole philippe

name: snowman
text: Curious old Philippe, hmm?  Curious old Philippe, hmm.

name: fuckyoufriday
text: A good example of how essential subtle shading of dialogue is to achewood's humor. "Alive stuffed animal", though awkward and grammatically questionable, is much funnier than "living stuffed animal", or "stuffed animal that's come to life". The caps and lack of puncuation lend a nice quality, too.

name: hyetal
text: You took the words right outta my mouth.

name: mattylite
text: No ? allows you to read it as a strong affirmative declaration instead of a question, like someone was really impressed by the extent to which Philippe was an alive stuffed animal. Is that an alive stuffed animal? HOLY CHRIST IS THAT AN ALIVE STUFFED ANIMAL

name: pwb
text:
I agree.

As an aside, a couple weeks ago my dogg remarked that his cousin's new puppy was like an "alive teddy bear," and I was reminded of this strip.

name: heccibiggs
text: Your use of the word "dogg" was confusing in this context.

name: f1shst1ck
text: The dynamic of them actually being stuffed animals interacting in a human world is kind of lost later in the strip.

name: zapatos
text: Mentioning it every six strips would be redundant.

name: obvious
text: The use of eyebrows takes a step forward in this strip.

name: audhumla
text: It is a question without a mark

name: saint
text:
speaking of "mark," the lack of punctuation from the trick or treater in the last panel had me cracking up.

just wanted to share that with the adoring public.

name: snowman
text: Yeah, why is it that incorrect or missing punctuation can be so funny sometimes?

name: rowboat
text: I don't....know; man?

name: ariamaki
text: One of the best off-panel pieces of dialog ever. Honestly. "Holy Christ, is that an Alive stuffed animal." Onestad, hats off to you yet again.

name: heccibiggs
text: I think you got lamed for spelling Onstad wrong.

name: fineoakstructure
text: 1stad

name: redjoker
text: 1 stad? coming right up, sir.

name: zzzleepy
text: philippe's gonna get us busted!

name: qeramah
text: I bet they give out candy that they made themselves. The kind that your parents won't let you eat, so you hide it and eat it when you're in bed. The BEST kind.

name: neitherman
text: I don't recall ever having someone sing "Trick or Treat" to me.

name: ghoti
text: It's kind of a sing-song.

name: deusoma
text: True. I got it screamed at me a few times. I don't remember Halloween being a volume contest when I was a kid, but then I'm an old man of 22.

name: starch
text: I like how phillipe has gotten more innocent as time has gone on.

name: roboticspencer
text: This is what got me hooked. Specifically the last panel.

name: em2
text: Five for the last panel alone.

name: gmm
text: Amen, raw five for that line.

name: sparhawk
text: The ghost, the soldier and the otter went to the riverside to trade tall tales and throw parcels of quince at one another.

name: deusoma
text: In the first panel, Phillipe has spotted Solid Snake trying to infiltrate the house.

name: shoinan
text:
In the second panel he used his Octocamo to disguise himself as a quaver.

Ew, that felt dirty.

name: tom-ba
text: And this is the strip that made me join.

name: arelladawn
text: This is, as far as I can tell, the first and one of the ONLY times the issue of the characters interacting with non-Onstad humans is addressed.

name: lumb
text:
A shoe is an item of cscs exam footwear evolved at first to protect the human foot and later, additionally, as an item of decoration in itself. The foot contains more bones than any other single part of the body, and has evolved over hundreds of thousands of years in relation to vastly varied terrain and climatic conditions. Together with the proprioceptive system, it is cset exam what makes balance and ambulation possible.

Until recent years, shoes were not fcat exam worn by most of the world's population%u2014largely because they could not afford them. Only with the advent of mass production, making available for the first time the cheap flip-flop-type sandal, for example, has shoe-wearing ftce exam become predominant.
